Oyunun en büyük eksiği rütbe sistemi olabilir.
Yaklaşık 80 saatim olduğu zaman karşıma 6 bin saati olan adamlar geliyor.
Oyunun topluluğu ise Cringe. Oyundaki hataları düzeltmek veya oyunu daha çok oynanabilir hale getirmek yerine oyunu cinselliğe çekip korku temasını bitiriyorlar.

Benim için en büyük sıkıntılardan biri ise "Nurse" Katili. Katile,oyunun bize sunduğu ana kaçma taktikleri hiçbir işe yaramıyor(palet ve pencere gibi).Eğer katil sizinle eşit bir beceriye sahip oyuncuysa o oyunu kaybetme olasılığınız %60 dan fazla.

Ama arkadaşınız varsa oyun yine de çok eğlenceli.

Katil önerileri için;
Blight(maraz), Plague(veba), Oni, Pyramid head ve nemesisi öneririm.Evet Zor karakterler ama yeterince pratikle katili çözerek çok eğleneceğinizi düşünüyorum.

In my group of friends, I was't the one to have most stuff. So my friends would brag about this game, that game, what ever game they would talk about (so would I). So in High school my group would always talk about this game almost daily, I knew about it from Dashie (Dashiegames) when he used to play it. So I knew what was going on in the game and what not. But now that I have it with over 30Hrs I can confidently say this Co-Op Multiplayer game is good. There are some people on the Killer side of things that piss me the fuck off like for instance with the wraith he has the ability to ring a bell and make himself invisible for LONG period of time to point where he can literally pop up right beside you while doing a generator (you do see a outline of him but its very faint, so if you blink your fucked) and kill you so there's that and on the survivor side too like players just crouching on the other side of the map to wait for an ability on the killers side to pass when you can clearly do something since the killer is facing some one particular other than you, but other than that it's good. As you can tell this game is rage inducing so be prepared for some bullshit coming your way. I don't want to blabber on about some rage inducing stories and have this review be a whole short story for any person that reads this so yeah have fun playing this game if you do get it.
taking back my good review tbh this game is just shit after the new update

Dead by Daylight is a multiplayer (4vs1) horror game where one player takes on the role of the savage Killer, and the other four players play as Survivors, trying to escape the Killer and avoid being caught and killed Also I'm a Massive Simp For Amanda Young [The Pig] <3
Nawet dobra gra,tylko czasami denerwuje gdy bez żadnej przyczyny wyrzuca do pulpitu.

How to get a cake:

900g margarine
250g sugar
1 packet of vanilla sugar
6 eggs, separated (beaten)
juice of one lemon
1kg low-fat curd
100g flour
1 tablespoon of baking powder
optionally 125g raisins

Mix everything together and bake it at 175°C for 90 minutes.
[spoiler]The cake isn't a lie 🎂[/spoiler]

Haven't played in a while so I came back during Behavior's newest anniversary event, and I'll keep this relatively brief. The fact that Myers can follow you around stalking you has always been annoying and there was little to no counterplay. But, the fact that he has an add-on where once he's tier 3 he can just walk up and insta kill you? Without having to hook you? And he can do it multiple times? Straight up a core tenet of how not to design a multiplayer game. You do not sacrifice and remove a player's ability to participate and enjoy your game with absolutely no way for them to avoid it. Again, he can do this multiple times. This is something straight out of a nightmare in design, the fact that this passed multiple checks and was still greenlit is astonishing. So no, I don't recommend this game friends, it's terrible.
